General.Name: Take Solutions Limited
General.Description: TAKE Solutions Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides domain-intensive services in life sciences and supply chain management worldwide. It offers clinical research, generics development, data sciences, regulatory affairs, and pharmacovigilance and safety services backed by technology expertise. It also provides embed digital and employ mobile solutions for patient centricity insight in life science sector; and payer solutions including access to billing insight through cloud adoption. In addition, it offers payer-provider digital solution, which includes personalized medicine, wellness, and patient engagement; and medical device solution, such as technological transformation with chip level programming, wearables, DICOM devices, PROM, nano devices, and sensors. The company was incorporated in 2000 and is headquartered in Chennai, India. TAKE Solutions Limited is a subsidiary of TAKE Solutions Pte. Limited.
General.Address: No. 27, Tank Bund Road, Chennai, India, 600034
